schema.title: MQTT Source options
schema.description: An Astarte Flow source that produces data from an MQTT connection.

broker_url.description: The URL of the broker the source will connect to.
broker_url.title: Broker URL

client_id.description: The client id used to connect. Defaults to a random string.
client_id.title: Client ID

ignore_ssl_errors.description: If true, accept invalid certificates (e.g. self-signed) when using SSL.
ignore_ssl_errors.title: Ignore SSL errors

username.description: Username used to authenticate to the broker.
username.title: Username

password.description: Password used to authenticate to the broker.
password.title: Password

client_cert_pem.description: PEM encoded client certificate, used for mutual SSL authentication.
client_cert_pem.title: Client Certificate

private_key_pem.description: PEM encoded private key, used for mutual SSL authentication.
private_key_pem.title: Private Key

subscriptions.description: A non-empty list of topic filters to subscribe to.
subscriptions.title: Subscriptions

subtype.description: A MIME type that will be put as `subtype` in the generated Messages. Defaults to `application/octet-stream`.
subtype.title: Subtype
